projects.title: Hes Otomotiv E-Commerce Project
projects.description: The Hes Otomotiv E-Commerce Project is a specially designed e-commerce platform for an Istanbul-based automotive spare parts company. Developed to meet the company's needs, it features a Node.js (Express) backend, a React-based admin panel, and a user interface built with Next.js. Stock management is integrated using MongoDB database. The unique interface design is created with Bootstrap, while the project infrastructure is supported by AWS S3 and EC2 technologies. Admin panel and user interface codes are accessible on GitHub. The live version of the project can be explored on the website.

projects.title: Abalam E-Commerce Project
projects.description: The Abalam E-Commerce Project is a full-stack e-commerce platform developed for a store selling baby products. Within the project, a Node.js backend, a React-based admin panel, and a user interface built with Next.js were created. Data is stored in a MongoDB database. Bootstrap CSS library was used in the design process to achieve a modern look. The project servers are hosted on AWS EC2, and AWS S3 service is utilized for photo storage. With the integration of these technologies, the Abalam E-Commerce Project offers a robust and user-friendly e-commerce experience.

projects.title: My School Projects
projects.description: I had the opportunity to develop various applications at Kocaeli University. I developed many projects in areas such as web applications, deep learning, image processing, artificial intelligence using different technologies such as JavaScript, C#, Java, Python. These projects played a significant role at the beginning of my career. You can access these applications through my GitHub page.
